Talk_01_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Who knows? <sp:5:0:0>Maybe it was a joke some
prankster scribbled in there.<sp:5:0:0> But if there
is a <clr:0000>mushroom haven<clr:ffff>, we have to find it!
Talk_00_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>To think that <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> would take over
our tent!

Just when we'd found a cave that had
a trove of mushrooms and who knows
what else?
Talk_01_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>This is between us, you understand.
Me, my sister...<sp:5:1:0>and now you.
Near_00_00: We have to get it back!
Talk_01_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If the message we saw in that field guide
was accurate, <sp:5:0:0>then the haven must be
here in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>We just have to find the <clr:0000>pond<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> and follow
the <clr:0000>drifting steam<clr:ffff> to its <clr:0000>source<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>So, we'd better get going.<sp:5:1:0> Thanks, buddy!<sp:5:0:0>
For getting our tent back!
Talk_01_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>...<snd:Notice_00>Oh! Your pouch is full.<sp:0:4:0>I was going to give you some of our home
cooking. <sp:5:0:0>Could you organize your things
and get back to me?
Talk_00_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, it's you! Here you are again!
Talk_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Huh? You defeated them?<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>There aren't any more monsters?
Talk_00_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>S-stop it!


We've got a real problem on our hands,
given what's happened to our tent.

It's not the time to talk about <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>.
Talk_00_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>You're right.<sp:5:1:0> Still, just when we found
a cave that surely had a trove of
mushrooms and more...
Talk_01_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was going to repay you for retrieving our
tent with a nice, home-cooked meal.

But your pouch is still full. Why don't you
throw something out and get back to me?
Talk_00_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>All right, all right. <sp:5:0:0>So, we found a cave
at the bottom of a mountain, along this
road for a bit.
We pitched our tent there, and then
hurried back here to the stable.
Near_01_00: No going back to our tent.
Talk_01_11: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey,<sp:5:0:0> you made room!<sp:5:1:0> Here you go, then!
Talk_00_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Angry_01>Right. And by the time we got back to
our tent, we found monsters inside.
That's our tent though!
Talk_00_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>And that's why, despite our bumping
into each other again here, this is totally
not the time to talk about <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>.
We have to chase off those
<clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>somehow.
Talk_01_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>We owe you. So, here you go.
Talk_00_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I'm sorry, we finally bumped into each
other again here. But really, it's no time
to talk about <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>.
We have to chase the <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>away
from our tent somehow.
Talk_01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>What a relief. Most of what we packed
for our journey is in that tent. Now we
can continue to search for <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>We're going to bring you into our secret
quest to find <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>, as we promised.
Talk_01_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We're on the hunt for a fabled placeâ€”<sp:5:0:0>a
<clr:0000>haven of mushrooms<clr:ffff>.

We discovered a note in a field guide to
mushrooms that hinted of something
spectacular! It said...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>"Vapors drift over Sturnida Basin, near a
pond in Hebra. At the source of the steam
lies a bright mushroom haven."
Talk_01_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>At the time, we didn't think much of it.<sp:5:1:0>
Just a strange little note someone left
in the margins.
Then the Upheaval happened and caves
opened up. And we thought maybe, just
maybe...<sp:5:0:0>we could find a haven of our own.
